title: september 22: how the dead sea scrolls got online
description:
What do you get when you have a group of Bedouin teenagers and goats hanging out near the caves of the Dead Sea? Well, on this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, we learn that through a lost goat and an adventurous teenager, the discovery of the oldest biblical manuscripts in the world were found. As Maia shares further details of the story, we learn that these major archaeological finds were at one point not seen as significant. Alongside this story, Maia also shares a heartfelt musical history story of a fundraising concert that produced over $200 million dollars! Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
